name: Blackthorn Cocktail
description: This cocktail is tasty and intriguing, at turns sweet, savory, and spicy, with hints of cloves and cinnamon. It's something like a cold mulled wine, which is perfect for the holidays. As a bonus, it's dead simple to make.

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a mixing glass or shaker tin with ice and add the sloe gin, vermouth, and bitters.
Stir well until very cold. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass or two cordial glasses.
Squeeze a lemon peel over the top and drop the peel into the drink. Serve.
